attributes.additional_details:
Instead of prison or ASBO’s, a “Boot Camp” would be a better option to turn around this growing problem of a disenfranchised and uneducated youth.
Discipline, responsibility and respect are the three qualities that every civilised human being needs.
Military style tough training together with excercise, sport and occupational guidance is what is required.
Give them a sense of self worth and set them on the right path for the future. Tough love works.
These children are tomorrow’s citizens; the Government should look at this for all our sakes.
